name: Cherrim
flavorText:
It blooms during times of strong
sunlight. It tries to make up for
everything it endured as a bud.
formDescription: Sunshine form is active during strong sunlight.  Otherwise, Cherrim defaults to its Overcast form.

previous.name: Cherubi
previous.flavorText:
The small ball holds the nutrients
needed for evolution. Apparently,
it is very sweet and tasty.

next.name: Shellos
next.flavorText:
Its colors and shapes differ from
region to region. In the Sinnoh
region, two types are confirmed.
next.formDescription: Forms only affect appearance.  A form is determined before a wild encounter based on whether the battle is in western or eastern Sinnoh, or inherited from the mother when breeding, and cannot be changed.

pokemon.name: Cherubi

The small ball holds the nutrients
needed for evolution. Apparently,
it is very sweet and tasty.
